input.sentences: little red riding hood the axe murderer shows up at the halloween party .
the party is already in full swing as lots of costumed friends are standing around celebrating .
some of the costumes are scary | such as this grim reaper .
others are goofy like this [male] farley .
but at the end of the day | all of the partiers have a good time .
output.sentences: Little Red Riding Hood is who I chose to be for Halloween.
There was even a scary grim reaper.
The party ended on a good note and everyone was happy.
